page.title: 20SURVEY RESULTS
page.content: Results of a survey of the{lifestyles} of 100 Mansbridge residents: 100% like living here. Average length of residence 25 years. 25% employed within 2 miles of home. 56% would like more shops. 61% own transport. Main source of heating - 19% use electricity, 81% use gas. Occupations include:- Marine Tasks, Factory Workers, Building{Trade,}Retail Trade, Medical and Social Personnel, 'White Collar' and Secretarial Work. Hobbies include:- a variety of sports and indoor{recreations,}handicraft, collecting, uniformed organisations, dancing, walking, music, reading, travel, gardening, nature study, camping, wine making and photography. There is a community centre which is used by 39% of the residents. 70% use the public{transport}services.
